item0.name: Cull
item0.description:
7 Attack Damage
  • Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Manamune
item2.description:
35 Attack Damage
500 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Attack or Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana gain doubled if the target is a champion. This item transforms into Muramana once 360 bonus Mana has been granted.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item3.name: Hearthbound Axe
item3.description:
15 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
  • Nimble: Attacking a unit grants (20 | 10 for Ranged champions) Move Speed for 2 seconds.

item4.name: Sheen
item4.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage) physical damage (1.5s cooldown).

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Rapid Firecannon
item0.description:
35% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.

    Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item2.name: Muramana
item2.description:
35 Attack Damage
860 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Shock: When targetting champions, Ability strikes and Attacks ( On-Hit) apply an additional (2.5% max Mana) physical damage.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'
